nodes.text: The seal breaks. Light pours from the clapper like water from a broken dam.
The memory floods outward, carried on the wind back to the village.
When you return, the village is changed.
Every villager remembers now. Their founders' crime. The betrayal. The cost.

nodes.speaker: Elder
nodes.text: You've doomed us to division and doubt.

nodes.speaker: Elder
nodes.text: We were at peace. Now we are burdened.

nodes.speaker: Companion
nodes.text: No. They've given us the chance to be better than our founders.

nodes.speaker: Companion
nodes.text: We can choose truth. We can choose to grow.
The bell rings. But its sound is different now.
Some villagers are shaken. Some are angry. But others are grateful.
Time flows again. The cycle is restored.
You walk through the village as people grapple with their history.
The truth is free. The future is uncertain. But it is yours.
